content: this legal text summarizes the division of assets between several parties the assets being divided include two apartments and agricultural land located in castelfidardo the parties involved are mr mip mrs cp mr gp mr lp and mrs map the land is sold for €80000 each party is assigned their share of the assets with mr lp receiving the first apartment mrs map receiving the second apartment and mr mip and mrs cp sharing ownership of the agricultural land the values of each share are specified mr gp also receives a portion of the money from the land sale the text concludes with the parties settling the remaining balance and issuing discharge receipts
